name: 抗日英雄Anti Japanese Heroes
description: This is a horizontal action game set during the Anti Japanese War, when the Japanese army invaded China and the people picked up weapons to fight back against the invaders. Among them, there are many extraordinary individuals with unique skills, and players will play the role of anti Japanese heroes to counter the invaders. There are 6 optional characters in the game, namely Farmer, Martial Monk, Qigong Master, Balu, Spy, and slingshot King. The gameplay is relatively simple and easy to operate, eliminating the enemies in front of you. Faced with countless invaders, can you kill all the enemies or end the game?
